title: Prescribing of adrenaline auto-injectors duo packs
description: The percentage of single adrenaline auto-injectors items as a proportion of all adrenaline auto-injector pens.
numerator_short: Percentage of adrenaline auto-injector single packs
why_it_matters: It is recommended that patients at risk of anaphylaxis have two adrenaline auto-injectors available to them at all times. This is in case a second dose is needed whilst waiting for the emergency services. Patients do not have to be dispensed 'duo packs' but this may help to ensure that they have two adrenaline auto-injectors ready.
numerator_where: bnf_code LIKE '0304030C0%BF' AND quantity_per_item < 2 --Adrenaline auto-injectors (brands and generic)
